name: Native City
description:
Collect peasants before they leave for the big city life! You can send them to work on the field only when a house is full. If you don't get them in time they will definitely leave and won't come back! Make people work, grow food and sell it to upgrage warehouses. See how long you can keep this up before the urbanization kicks in!

Controls:

  • LMB - collect people
  • RMB - build a house/warehouse

Prototype created by Daniil Chebotkov

Game Engine - Unreal Engine 4

Credits:

  • Peasant woman from Mixamo.com
